q: Player for nearly 20 minutes, using his quickness to prevent Allen Iverson from even getting the ball, let alone shoot it. He had spent the last two practices impersonating Allen Iverson and apparently got pretty good at it. I just try to deny him the ball as much as possible, because when he does get the ball, the best penetrator in the game is going to be hard to stop, Tyronn Lue said.`` We were trying to keep the ball out of his hands as much as possible.''`` He was holding me the whole time,'' Allen Iverson said http://wn.com/Nathan_plays_Not_Fair_by_Lily_Allen_Keyboard_Cover_[KARAOKE_/_INSTRUMENTAL] This is my cover of

Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. a recent Gallup Poll. Presidents Jimmy Carter ( 45.3 percent), Ronald Reagan ( 43.3 percent) and Bill Clinton ( 45.9 percent) had lower approval rating averages during their second years in office, Gallup reports. Barack Obama 's low second-year ratings are due in large part to the struggles of the U.S. economy, Jeffrey M. Jones wrote for Gallup.`` The other presidents with low second-year averages also took office during difficult economic times. Jimmy Carter Secretary of State Colin Powell said Barack Obama has made some achievements, but said Barack Obama must focus on job creation- the Bill Clinton 's most challenging task.`` We didn't elect Superman,'' Michael Hansen said

It comes after Downing St director of communications Andy Coulson quit amid allegations about phone hacking at the News of the World when he was editor. Labour deputy leader Harriet Harman , speaking on Sky News, said: Hacking into people's phones is illegal. Obviously the criminal law has got to be complied with and if it is broken then it should be investigated by the police and it should be enforced.`` Nobody is above the law, no newspaper editor, no journalist.
